btClient

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • btClient.Block

  • public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    An object representing a single block within a Piece; This class contains the for this block and keeps track of relevant data pertaining to the block such as
    Author:
    Cody

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean downloaded
      Boolean value indicating whether this block as already been downloaded and saved to the disk
      private int index
      The zero based index of this block
      private boolean lastBlock
      Indicates whether this block is the last block in the piece
      private int offset
      The offset of this block in bytes
      private int piece_index
      The zero based index of the piece that this block belongs too
      private int size
      The size of this block in bytes
